## ğŸ“¦ What's Bundled

### **Fonts Included:**
- **Inter Font**: Body text (300-700 weights)
- **Raleway Font**: Headings (700-800 weights)

### **Bundle Size:**
- **CSS File**: ~5.7 MB (includes all fonts)
- **Gzipped**: ~4.2 MB (compressed)
- **JavaScript**: Unchanged (~816 KB)

## ğŸ”§ Technical Details

### **Font Packages Added:**
```json
{
  "@fontsource/inter": "^5.x.x",
  "@fontsource/raleway": "^5.x.x", 
  "@fontsource/material-symbols-outlined": "^5.x.x"
}
```

### **CSS Imports:**
```css
/* Automatically included in the bundled CSS */
@import '@fontsource/inter/300.css';
@import '@fontsource/inter/400.css';
@import '@fontsource/inter/500.css';
@import '@fontsource/inter/600.css';
@import '@fontsource/inter/700.css';
@import '@fontsource/raleway/700.css';
@import '@fontsource/raleway/800.css';
@import '@fontsource/material-symbols-outlined/400.css';
@import '@fontsource/material-symbols-outlined/500.css';
@import '@fontsource/material-symbols-outlined/600.css';
@import '@fontsource/material-symbols-outlined/700.css';
```
